ComicInfo.Title: The Fall of G.I. Joe Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
THE FALL OF G.I. JOE! Scarlett’s last chance to save the G.I. JOE team’s existence is threatened on all sides—the U.S. government, shady spy organizations, two warring factions in a nation in the throes of civil war… plus the benevolent peace-keeping forces of Cobra?!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Jeffrey Veregge | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Steve Kurth (a) & Kito Young (c) | 2 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | David Williams (a) & Kelsey Shannon (c) | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 09:02:17. [CVDB468480]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: David Williams, Jeffrey Veregge, Kelsey Shannon, Kito Young, Steve Kurth
ComicInfo.Characters: Agent Helix, Big Ben, Duke, Flint, Joshua Spinetti, Mainframe, Roadblock, Scarlett, Siren, Tomax
ComicInfo.Locations: England, Galibi, London, North America, Schleteva, Washington D.C., White House
